synopsis.text: Fei Wei, a man renowned for his uncanny ability to shoot a leaf from afar, becomes the object of aspiration for Ji Chang, a gifted archer with dreams of becoming the world's greatest. Based on Atsutshi Nakajima's short story 'Meijin-den', the film 'To Shoot without Shooting' follows Ji Chang's relentless pursuit of mastery. After years of persistent attempts to learn from Fei Wei, Ji Chang is finally accepted as his disciple. As he absorbs the teachings of his master, Ji Chang embarks on a transformative journey that takes him from the pinnacle of archery skills to the mysterious mountains in search of an enigmatic old man with supernatural powers. Ultimately, Ji Chang's journey leads him to a profound realization about the true essence of his craft, as he evolves from a skilled archer to a man who transcends the need for a bow.
